Description: Pre-owned pair of Authentic Ray-Ban sunglasses. FERRARI LIMITED EDITION. Great shape, excellent condition. The lenses look pretty clean, except for the extremely minor hairline scratch towards the left upper corner of the right lens; a couple of dots towards the right side of the left lens and two moderate ones towards the left the lower corner of the left lens. Nothing obstructs the view. The frame is in a great shape, except for a couple of discoloration spots on the left temple end - not noticeable when wearing being behind the ear. Please see pictures for better understanding the condition of the glasses. Very stylish sunglasses made with the top quality of the brand! MSRP $280 Size : 61-13 140 Model : RB8313M F011/71 Comes with the authentic PREMIUM Ray Ban case, cleaning cloth and pamphlet. NO RETURNS accepted unless the item is grossly misrepresented.
